thread.title: The Low-Cost Way to Live Abroad: Buy a Boat

author: Dan Neil
title: The Low-Cost Way to Live Abroad: Buy a Boat
text:
WITH A drink in one hand and a garden hose in the other, Bruce was living the dream.

I think it was Bruce. The one detail of this whole weird encounter I can’t seem to remember is this cat’s name. Anyway, the native South African was giving his boat a bit o’ polish one afternoon in July 2015 when I met him near the town of Chester in northwest England. The snake-bellied McLaren I was driving couldn’t quite negotiate an old stone bridge leading to town. Hoping to find a footbridge, I parked and walked down to the bank of what...
